name: Super Glitter Rush
description:
[h2What is Super Glitter Rush?[/h2]
Super Glitter Rush is a boss-rush style bullet hell shoot-em-up!

Fight against 30+ cute and unique bosses!

Features

  • Deflect enemy's bullets back at them! Exhilarating shoot-em-up!
  • Over 30 unique bosses!
  • A colorful pixel art and lots of unlockable color palettes!
